class_notes: (THIS SECTION IS FULL; contact candleregistrar@emory.edu to be placed on waiting list) (ON CAMPUS)
course_description: Survey of American religious history from colonial era to present focusing on history of American Christian traditions in relation to other religious traditions. Students will study theological ideas in their wide-ranging social & political contexts.
